title: Fix Order tab navigation not responding

requirements.text: Fix the Order tab in the bottom navigation bar so that clicking it successfully navigates to the Order/order-taking page. Ensure the active route highlight works correctly for the /order route and that the tab responds to user interaction without errors.

quotes: how do i order the order tab is not working

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Order tab in the bottom navigation bar navigates to the /order page
The Order tab is visually highlighted as active when on the /order route
No console errors are thrown when clicking the Order tab
The OrderTaking page renders correctly after navigation
Navigation between Order, Menu, and Reports tabs all function without issues

constraints: Do not change the backend schema or Motoko actor
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding new order features or UI changes beyond fixing navigation
Changing the menu page or reports page
